謬.definition: (bound form) false; erroneous; absurd; mu (Greek letter Μμ)

謬獎.definition: to overpraise; You praise me too much!

謬種.definition: error; fallacy; misconception; scoundrel; You swine!

謬種流傳.definition: to pass on errors or lies (idiom); the propagation of misconceptions

謬見.definition: erroneous views; false idea; false opinion
